table_description: Information about service descriptions, including ID, name, environment, and deployment configuration.

columns.name: id
columns.description: The unique identifier for the service.

columns.name: autoDeploy
columns.description: Indicates whether the service deploys automatically.

columns.name: branch
columns.description: The branch associated with the service.

columns.name: buildFilter
columns.description: The build filter associated with the service.

columns.name: createdAt
columns.description: The timestamp of when the service was created.

columns.name: dashboardUrl
columns.description: The URL to the service's dashboard.

columns.name: environmentId
columns.description: The ID of the environment associated with the service.

columns.name: imagePath
columns.description: The image path used by the service.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the service.

columns.name: notifyOnFail
columns.description: Indicates whether to notify on build failure.

columns.name: ownerId
columns.description: The ID of the owner of the service.

columns.name: registryCredential
columns.description: The registry credentials associated with the service.

columns.name: repo
columns.description: The repository associated with the service.

columns.name: rootDir
columns.description: The root directory for the service.

columns.name: slug
columns.description: The slug associated with the service.

columns.name: suspended
columns.description: Indicates whether the service is suspended.

columns.name: suspenders
columns.description: A list of suspenders associated with the service.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The type of the service.

columns.name: updatedAt
columns.description: The timestamp of the last update to the service.

columns.name: serviceDetails
columns.description: The details of the service.
